titles: Haue vvith you to Saffron-vvalden. Or, Gabriell Harueys hunt is vp Containing a full answere to the eldest sonne of the halter-maker. Or, Nashe his confutation of the sinfull doctor. The mott or posie, in stead of omne tulit punctum: pacis fiducia nunquam. As much to say, as I sayd I would speake with him.
author: Nash, Thomas, 1567-1601.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Harvey, Gabriel, 1550?-1631 --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
